description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9qqk9","text":"Takes the US Census results and geographic data and creates electoral districts that are iso-populous (same population in each district). This eliminates gerrymandering since it only uses openly available census data, with an algorithm that can be checked by anybody with a common computer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
